dublin_core.dcvalue: Advances in digital imaging methods have resulted in use of telecytology in the immediate assessment of fine needle aspiration FNA specimens We retrospectively compared the nondiagnostic rate for endoscopic ultrasound guided EUS FNA of pancreatic lesions in two groups one with on site evaluation for adequacy via telecytopathology and the other without on site adequacy evaluation
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Telecytopathology for on-site adequacy evaluation decreases the nondiagnostic rate in endoscopic ultrasound-guided fine-needle aspiration of pancreatic lesions.
